messages.subject: re.food issue
messages.msgSnippet: My son ate - mashed potato,very little meat, (no vegies no fruit) pancakes - yorkshire puddings - and weetbix with milk and sugar. Oh and tomato sauce
messages.messageBody:
My son ate - mashed potato,very little meat, (no vegies no fruit)
pancakes - yorkshire puddings - and weetbix with milk and sugar. Oh
and tomato sauce sandwhiches.
Every thing else except his weetbix, had tomato sauce on.......I once
made him eat some thing he didnt like and he vomited - I never did
that again.
My son is now 31yrs old. He is a strong healthy father of 2. He
still eats his weetbix every day - he now will eat vegies and fruit
too!
Marianne
